branchCategory.name: CQ2
branchCategory.description: The CQ2 compact cylinder is the world's best selling pneumatic cylinder and is supported globally. The CQ2 is available in 15 bore sizes from 12mm to 200mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. 42 standard options make it one of the most versatile cylinder series on the market. For mounting flexibility, it is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)Q2-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting Single Rod
branchItem.description: Standard double acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 100mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)Q2W-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting Double Rod
branchItem.description: Standard double acting, double rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 100mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)Q2-Z, Compact Cylinder, Single Acting Single Rod
branchItem.description: Standard single acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder. The CQ2 single acting is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 50mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)Q2-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Large Bore
branchItem.description: Large Bore standard double acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 125mm to 200mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces..

branchItem.name: C(D)Q2WB-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting Double Rod, Large Bore
branchItem.description: Large bore standard double acting, double rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 125mm to 200mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)Q2-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting Single Rod, Long Stroke
branchItem.description: Long stroke standard double acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 100mm and strokes up to 300mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)Q2K-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Non-rotating
branchItem.description: Standard double acting, non-rotating single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 63mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)Q2KW-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Double Rod, Non-rotating
branchItem.description: Standard double acting, non-rotating double rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 63mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: CDQ2*P, Compact Cylinder, High Magnetic Field Design
branchItem.description: For welding environments, this standard double acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder includes a high magnetic field capable magnet and a rod coil scraper. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 50mm to 80mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)QP2B, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Axial Piping
branchItem.description: Axial piping version of the standard double acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder include both ports on one side of the actuator. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 100mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)QP2B, Compact Cylinder, Single Acting, Single Rod, Axial Piping
branchItem.description: Axial piping version of the standard single acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder include ports on the end of the actuator. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 12mm to 100mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)Q2*S-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Anti-lateral Load
branchItem.description: High lateral load version of the standard double acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder allows for higher side loads that the standard CQ2. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 32mm to 100mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)BQ2, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, End Lock
branchItem.description: End lock version of the standard double acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder. End of stroke locks are included can be used to hold a load in case of a loss of air pressure. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 20mm to 100mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)Q2*R-Z, Compact Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Water Resistant
branchItem.description: <p>Water resistant version of the standard double acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder includes a rod wiper to prevent moisture from entering the actuator. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 20mm to 100mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)Q2Y-Z, Smooth Air Cylinder, Low Friction, Low Speed, Double Acting
branchItem.description: Smooth acting standard double acting, single rod version of the CQ2 compact cylinder is for low speed and low pressure applications. The CQ2 is available in bore sizes from 32mm to 100mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. It is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: CQ2-Z, Compact, Double Acting Single Rod, Temperature Resistant Options
branchItem.description: The CQ2 compact cylinder is the world's best selling pneumatic cylinder and is supported globally. The CQ2 is available in 15 bore sizes from 12mm to 200mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. 42 standard options make it one of the most versatile cylinder series on the market. For mounting flexibility, it is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)Q2-Z, Compact, Double Acting Single Rod, Stroke Options
branchItem.description: The CQ2 compact cylinder is the world's best selling pneumatic cylinder and is supported globally. The CQ2 is available in 15 bore sizes from 12mm to 200mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. 42 standard options make it one of the most versatile cylinder series on the market. For mounting flexibility, it is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: C(D)Q2-Z, Compact, Double Acting Single Rod, Environmental Options
branchItem.description: The CQ2 compact cylinder is the world's best selling pneumatic cylinder and is supported globally. The CQ2 is available in 15 bore sizes from 12mm to 200mm. It comes standard with male or female piston rod threads. 42 standard options make it one of the most versatile cylinder series on the market. For mounting flexibility, it is possible to mount auto switches on any of the 4 surfaces.

branchItem.name: CQ2-Z, Accessory, Mounting Brackets
branchItem.description: Add on mounting brackets for the CQ2 series cylinder.

branchItem.name: CQ2/CQ2-Z, Accessory, Knuckle Joints
branchItem.description: Single and double rod knuckle joints for the CQ2 series cylinders.

branchItem.description: Add on mounting brackets for CQ2 series cylinders

branchItem.description: CQ2 series knuckle joint pins.

branchItem.description: Rod end jam nuts for CQ2 series cylinders

branchItem.name: CQ2/CQS, Double Clevis Pivot Bracket
branchItem.description: Double clevis brackets to mate with CQ2 series "D" mount

branchItem.name: CQ2P Auto Switch Mounting Bracket
branchItem.description: Auto switch mounting bracket for the Axial Piping CQ2 version.

branchItem.description: Auto switch mounting bracket for the Axial Piping CQ2 version.
